es.title: ¿Con qué aspectos de Rust tienes más dificultades?
options: Optimizar código (minificar binarios, mejorar performance, etc.)
Multiparadigma de Rust (OOP Rust version, functional Rust version)
Aplicar buenas prácticas y patrones (DDD, TDD, SOLID)
Interoperar con FFI (C bindings, C++, Node, Python, etc.)

en.title: Which aspects of Rust do you find most challenging?
options: Code optimization (minifying binaries, improving performance, etc.)
Rust's multiparadigm (OOP Rust version, functional Rust version)
Applying best practices and patterns (DDD, TDD, SOLID)
Interoperability with FFI (C bindings, C++, Node, Python, etc.)
